artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude Lorraine del / N 96 | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Pub. May 2, 1817 by Boydell & Co. 90 Cheapside, London. / From the Original Drawing in the Collection of the Duke of Devonshire. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: R. Earlom Sculp
portfolio: From Plate 96 from Liber Veritatis, vol. 3 (London, 1819)
title: Landscape with Herdsmen and the Departure of Jacob
